ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Check into the Temple of Solusek Ro cleric quests. Might be a bit too low level for a 38, but the Bracers of the Reverent are pretty nice (5 Wis each). Another
ygData.messageBody:
Check into the Temple of Solusek Ro cleric
quests. Might be a bit too low level for a 38, but the
Bracers of the Reverent are pretty nice (5 Wis each).
Another is the Coldain Prayer Shawl quest which I think
gives 5 Wis (maybe 6 now, not sure) when each of the
parts of the quest is done.<br>Other than those, I know
very little of quests as we druids have none of our
own. =(<br><br>Nukai Oakenwulf<br>Leader of the
Druidic Quest Movement <br>Chief Druid Executive of
Spiritus Valorum<br><br>(Kroq Coldscale<br> Defiler of
Xela Orcbane's grave<br> "I spit on your grave!
Ptooey!"<br> <evil grins> )
